description:
Mô Tả Công Việc
             

              Works at 241, Xuan Thuy, Dich Vong, Cau Giay, Hanoi
              

              Are you an enthusiastic developer with experience in ReactJS, Node JS, and Laravel? And are you curious about what joining a fast-paced startup that can make an impact in people’s lives is all about? Here at Helo, you will be part of a dynamic development team that’s re-envisioning the live streaming marketplace and how emerging artists, influencers, and experts can get discovered. We can’t tell you too much about the product yet because we would be giving away our secret sauce, but some important facts are:
              

              - Helo is a mobile app and web app in the live-streaming and social media space.
              
              - It’s not as simple as that. We also have a series of innovative features to help build communities and reward performers.
              
              - We’re a marketplace, so that means we target both talents that want to get discovered and users that are eager to access unique content.
              

              As a Full-stack developer, you’ll play a key role in building the next generation of live streaming products. Reporting to the technical team lead and working closely with the product team in Singapore, you’ll develop our highly scalable system as new features and performance improvements are constantly being added.

requirement:
Yêu Cầu Công Việc
             

              Your Skills and Experience:
              

              - At least 2+ years of experience in working with ReactJS and NodeJS. We use Express, Sails JS, and Socket.IO extensively.
              
              - Familiar with microservices
              
              - Familiar with CI/CD pipeline
              
              - Must be strong in Database design and development. We use both relational databases and NoSQL databases.
              
              - Good knowledge of Laravel framework.
              
              - Familiar with AWS services. We use EC2, S3, RDS MySQL, Lambda.
              
              - Experience in working with Nginx, MongoDB, Redis Cluster, Docker, Kubenetes, and Istio.
              
              - Excellent understanding of front-end technologies, e.g. HTML5, CSS3, Sass, JavaScript, Angular 6, Webpack, ReactJS.
              
              - Familiar with command line applications on Linux, Ubuntu.
              
              - Knowledge of Source Version Control. We use Bitbucket.
              
              - Familiar with Agile methodology. We use Scrum.
              
              - Good at logical thinking, proactive and able to quickly learn new technologies and self-motivated.
              
              - Good English speaking and writing skill. We write documents in English and you need to communicate directly with our Singapore office.
              

              Bonus Skills:
              

              - A mindset of coding quality, clean code, unit test, UI automation test.
              
              - Experience working with live stream video (RTMP), social network applications and/or Blockchain.
             

              Xem toàn bộ Yêu Cầu Công Việc
